body:
Yea, I think we can probably slurp most of this stuff into the install doc but by my count, we'll need ~5 hadoop docs:

- install https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/Release3/InstallHadoop200SE
- understanding https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/HadoopUnderstanding
- debug https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/Release3/HadoopDebug
- recovery https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/Release3/HadoopRecovery
- operations https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Storage/HadoopOperations
- xrootd? https://twiki.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/Release3/HadoopOverview
